summary.span: 在设计时提供 Web 窗体页的设计时功能的一个基类并允许访问和操作包含在 Web 窗体页中的组件和控件。

span.span: Provides a base class for the design-time functionality of a Web Forms page and allows access to and manipulation of components and controls that are contained within the Web Forms page at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设计宿主（如 [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] ）必须提供其自己的派生版本的类， 以便通过设计器的属性来控制设计器 。A design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], must provide its own derived version of the class to control designers through the property of the designer. 控件设计器使用 属性在设计时访问和操作包含 Web 窗体页。Control designers use the property to access and manipulate the containing Web Forms page at design time.

para.span: 从类继承时 ，必须重写以下成员：

span.span: When you inherit from the class, you must override the following members:
- The , , , , , and properties.
- The , , , , and methods.
ASP.NET Control Designers Overview
Extending Design-Time Support

related.span: 如何：在设计模式下扩展控件的外观和行为

span.span: How to: Extend the Appearance and Behavior of Controls in Design Mode

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，向 Web 窗体页中添加一个 Web 服务器控件。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, adds a Web server control to the Web Forms page.
The ID of the control that was added.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 虽然控件可能已分配有一个 ID，但如果 Web 窗体页中已存在具有相同 ID 的控件，则分配一个新的 ID。Although a control might already have an ID assigned to it, if there is already a control in the Web Forms page with the same ID, a new ID is assigned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由控件设计器调用，并提供一种方法，用于在 Web 窗体页中通过设计宿主（如）实现控件设计器的操作项 [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] 。The method is called by a control designer and provides a way for action items for the control designer to be implemented in the Web Forms page through a design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

Protected ReadOnly Property Verbs As DesignerVerbCollection
protected: property System::ComponentModel::Design::DesignerVerbCollection ^ Verbs { System::ComponentModel::Design::DesignerVerbCollection ^ get(); };
member this.Verbs : System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbCollection

summary.span: 获取设计器支持的设计时谓词。

span.span: Gets the design-time verbs that are supported by the designer.

value.span: 设计器所支持的 对象的数组；如果组件没有谓词，则为 。

span.span: An array of objects supported by the designer; otherwise, , if the component has no verbs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 通常，设计时环境在组件的快捷菜单上提供 " **属性** " 命令。Typically, a design-time environment provides a **Properties** command on a shortcut menu for a component. 因此，请不要在设计器指定的谓词的集合中包含类似的条目。Therefore, do not include a similar entry in the collection of designer-specified verbs.
